articles.title: Pampanga giant lanterns light up Philippine Center in New York - BusinessMirror
articles.description: THE Philippine Consulate General in New York, together with the Filipino-American community, commenced the Christmas season in the “Big Apple” through the first ever giant Christmas lantern lighting ceremony at the Philippine Center. Almost a hundred attended…

articles.title: Jackie Chan rarely does American films because they only cared about his English - The Star Online
articles.description: The 68-year-old Hong Kong star revealed that he spent one month memorising a single English line.
articles.content:
Hong Kong filmmaker-actor Jackie Chan recently appeared in a Chinese reality show, Memories Beyond Horizon, where he opened up about why he doesnt do American films very often.
